attributes.action: change the East Stand of St.James Park, Newcastle, to the Sir Bobby Robson stand
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like to prove to the owners of Newcastle United that there is enough support to change the East Stand at St.James Park to the Sir Bobby Robson stand, in tribute to the great man.

rejection.details: Please contact your local council with your suggestion.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
